issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Once a video is loaded from the gallery into a Ti.Media.VideoPlayer, a new video cannot be loaded from the gallery by setting the media property of the videoPlayer.

Test case
https://gist.github.com/anonymous/81f8ccdb6978d8da4a71

Reproduction steps:

1. Once app loads, click "Select video from media gallery"" and select a video.
2. Video loads
3. Click "Select video from media gallery" again and select another video
4. New video does not load
fields.summary: IOS: Cannot change media of videoPlayer by openPhotoGallery method once it loaded
fields.environment: iOS 8.1.3 on iPhone 6+. Ti SDK 3.4.1.GA and 3.5.0.GA.

comments.body: This is still an issue in 5.0.2.GA ... has it slipped thru the net?
